title: Machine Learning Operations (MLOps)
subtext: Streamline machine learning processes using DevOps principles
author: Buzzpy

description.title: Machine Learning Operations (MLOps)
texts: MLOps, or Machine Learning Operations, is the practice of applying DevOps principles to machine learning workflows. It aims to streamline the deployment, monitoring, and governance of machine learning models in production.
MLOps bridges the gap between data science and IT operations, enabling organizations to scale and manage their machine learning models efficiently.
